title: Best Of Comedy Gold Minds: Desus & Mero
description:
Revisit the time that Kevin met the comedians behind the comedy team of Desus and Mero.  They talk about how they started out as a team and their career path all the way through to their iconic interview with President Obama.

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Desus, Mero, Barack Obama)
